summary: Converts your externally taken screenshots to JPG and renames them automatically for uploading to steam. Not Skyrim specific.
descriptionHtml:
V 1.2 Update - Now supports BMP as well as PNG. They can be mixed in the same directory.
                       Thumbnail folder will now be created in the target directory and the files copied there by the tool. there is no need to copy manually (this needs to still be changed in the onscreen instructions)

V 1.3 Update - No user entry beyond path to files necessary; the next sequential file will be parsed automatically.  Also added option to delete the original images.

This tool takes your screenshots taken externally from things like reshade, enb, afterburner etc, and converts them to JPG and renames them in the 000X format necessary for uploading to steam. It will convert entire directories at once.
If there is interest I will expand it to include other image types.

This is not Skyrim specific. Would be nice if there was a way to upload miscellaneous utilities to this site.
Hope someone finds this useful, and feel free to comment with any suggestions.
author: Lord Belial - Jake
